definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="79" y="67"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityMonster</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">FALSE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:EssenceXP</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityAnimal</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.01</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">FALSE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:EssenceXP</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
